name: Overkill: Magic Exterminator
description:
A small game developed for the pizza jam 3. You must kill the ants before they take your pizza, the weapons at your disposal might be a bit too much.

Keys

w, a, s, d - Movement

q - Change weapon

mouse - To aim and shoot

Credits

Programming - Marcos Álvarez, Emanuel Rodriguez Aires, José Luis Rey Méndez 

Art - Franco Chioraia, Eduardo London

Music & Sound - Marcos Álvarez
